remarks: An explicit bound for the range of a bounded function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
suprnmpt.a $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
suprnmpt.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
suprnmpt.bnd $e |- ( ph -> E. y e. RR A. x e. A B <_ y ) $.
suprnmpt.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
suprnmpt.c $e |- C = sup ( ran F , RR , < ) $.
suprnmpt $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. RR /\ A. x e. A B <_ C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F y $.
$d ph x y $.
